name: Enhance
body:
### Welcome to enhance  
(Yet another) experimental 3D engine framework with render and basic support for implementing 3D applications.

## News  
  + 2016-08-28 - Ongoing changes to rendering and orientation modules. A trackball functionality was implemented on top of existing math utilities as well as UI eventing and event filtering modules. [demo](https://youtu.be/hnAWd_QL_XY)
  + 2016-08-20 - Ongoing refactoring of kernel modules. Several additions of UI and Filter modules enable keyboard and mouse event processing.
  + 2016-07-17 - Rendering code from previous branch was setup to run in the new infrastructure.  
This serves as the baseline for experimentation and changes.

## Release Targets:
    + V0_0_0: 2017-Jan.

### Support or Contact  
Check out our [wiki](https://github.com/bilbil/enhance/wiki) for more details.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
